title: RIOT THIS IS URGENT!!!
body: Riot if you are reading this, I just want to say I did not received the arcade icon nor my chest. Yesterday I played Miss Fortune ADC and got S on her but weirdly enough I did not get a Chest from it even though the chest was available. Also I did complete the first Arcade mission and did not received my Arcade Icon. Why do you do this to me Riot what have I done to deserve this cruel torture!?!?{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It looks like you didn't get a chest for scoring an S with Miss Fortune because you've already gotten a chest from her this season. Each champion can only give you 1 chest per season for getting an S or higher.

Also, some of those icons were a little delayed for some reason. I've sent out my best poro delivery team, so you should see that icon soon!
